catalog.description: Your clients use this bot to find your business, browse services, book appointments, and get automatic reminders. You don't have to do anything — the bot works for you.

items.answer: Yes, but you only use Lako Admin. Your clients use Lako Catalog to search and book appointments.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Three plans: Free — catalog listing + basic business card (free forever). Pro (€29/mo) — 24/7 online booking, free Telegram/Viber notifications instead of expensive SMS, click analytics. Business (€49/mo) — SEF integration (fiscal receipts), loyalty automation and cashback programs.

items.answer: Yes, we are fully GDPR-compliant. Your data is protected and never shared with third parties.

items.answer: Contact us — we build custom solutions for your specific business needs.

items.question: Can it integrate with my existing system?
items.answer: Currently Lako works as a standalone system. For custom integrations, contact us — we can build connections tailored to your needs.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Lako Services d.o.o. (hereinafter "we", "us" or "our") is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection of the Republic of Serbia and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content:
Lako Services d.o.o.
Novi Sad, Republic of Serbia
Email: info@lako.services

dataWeCollect.title: Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.content:
We collect the following data when you use our website:
- Full name
- Email address
- Phone number (optional)
- Business name and category
- Business address
- Website usage data (cookies)

botData.title: Data Collected Through Bots
botData.content:
When you use our Telegram or Viber bots, we collect:
- Your platform username
- Phone number (if you share it)
- Messages you send to the bot
- Booking and appointment data
- Interaction history with the bot

This data is stored on secure servers and used exclusively for:
- Processing your bookings and appointments
- Sending confirmations and reminders
- Improving service quality

gpsTracking.title: GPS Tracking
gpsTracking.content:
For logistics solutions, we use GPS tracking that includes:
- Real-time driver location
- Route history
- Estimated arrival time

The legal basis for processing this data is the contract between Lako Services and the driver's employer. GPS data is only processed during working hours.

Drivers have the right to:
- Be informed about tracking
- Access their location data
- Request deletion of historical location data

purposeOfProcessing.title: Purpose of Processing
purposeOfProcessing.content:
We process your data for the following purposes:
- Responding to your inquiries via the contact form
- Registering your business in the Lako catalog
- Sending registration status notifications
- Improving website functionality

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
We process your data based on:
- Your explicit consent (Article 12 of the Law)
- Performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures (Article 12 of the Law)
- Legitimate interest in improving our services

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We may share your data with:
- Resend (sending email notifications)
- Telegram Bot API (sending notifications)
- Cloudflare (website hosting and protection)
We do not sell your data to third parties.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected. Contact form data is retained for up to 2 years. Registered business data is retained while the account is active.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
You have the right to:
- Access your data
- Rectify inaccurate data
- Erase your data ("right to be forgotten")
- Restrict processing
- Data portability
- Object to processing
To exercise these rights, contact us at info@lako.services.

dataRequestProcedure.title: Data Request Procedure
dataRequestProcedure.content:
To submit a request regarding your personal data:

1. Send an email to info@lako.services with the subject "GDPR Request"
2. In the email, please include:
   - Your full name
   - Email address associated with your account
   - Type of request (access, rectification, deletion, etc.)
   - Description of the data your request concerns
3. We will respond to your request within 30 days
4. The first request is free; for repeated requests we may charge an administrative fee

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including HTTPS encryption, secure hosting on Cloudflare, and restricted data access.

children.title: Children
children.content: Our services are not intended for persons under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be processed outside Serbia through our service providers (Cloudflare, Resend). We ensure such transfers are protected by appropriate safeguards.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this policy. We will notify you of significant changes through our website.
